Senate honors ex-Senator Heherson Alvarez tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736757 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736757/senate-honors-ex-senator-heherson-alvarez/story/ P.S. Resolution No. 363 was adopted, taking into consideration P.S. Resolution Nos. 366, 371 and 382, to formalize such recognition and expression of condolences to the loved ones of the late former Senator Heherson Alvarez. All senators were made authors. Mon, 04 May 2020 17:43:04 +0800
34 health workers die of COVID-19; over 1,700 more infected -DOH tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736755 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736755/34-health-workers-die-of-covid-19-over-1-700-more-infected-doh/story/ Thirty-four healthcare workers have died on the frontlines in the battle against the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), the Department of Health (DOH) said Monday. Senate approves Alternative Learning System measure in hybrid session tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736754 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736754/senate-approves-alternative-learning-system-measure-in-hybrid-session/story/ With 22 affirmative votes via hybrid plenary session, the Senate on Monday approved on third and final reading the Alternative Systems Act which seeks to provide alternative basic education programs outside the formal school system especially in underserved and far-flung communities, as well as in communities under emergencies. Mon, 04 May 2020 17:27:43 +0800
Japan extends virus state of emergency until May 31 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736752 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736752/japan-extends-virus-state-of-emergency-until-may-31/story/ "I will extend the period of the state of emergency I declared on April 7 until May 31. The area covered is all prefectures in the nation," Shinzo Abe said after a meeting to discuss the measures. Mon, 04 May 2020 17:22:02 +0800
Senate adopts rules for 'hybrid' sessions, hearings amid COVID-19 threat tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736751 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736751/senate-adopts-rules-for-hybrid-sessions-hearings-amid-covid-19-threat/story/ During the course of hybrid plenary sessions, senators may vote, sponsor committee reports, and participate during the interpellation and period of amendments, regardless if their attendance is physical or online. Mon, 04 May 2020 17:07:04 +0800

UK says China has questions to answer over coronavirus outbreak tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736749 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736749/uk-says-china-has-questions-to-answer-over-coronavirus-outbreak/story/ LONDON - Britain said on Monday that China has questions to answer over the information it shared about the novel coronavirus outbreak, but refused to comment on reports that a US-led intelligence consortium had a accused Beijing of a cover-up. NTC should provide ABS-CBN with provisional authority -Zubiri tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736737 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736737/ntc-should-provide-abs-cbn-with-provisional-authority-zubiri/story/ It is right for the National Telecommunications Commission (NTC) to issue ABS-CBN Corporation with a provisional authority to operate as the media corporation's 25-year franchise expired on Monday, said Senate Majority Leader Juan Miguel Zubiri. Marikina opens 3 quarantine facilities for COVID-19 patients with mild symptoms, PUIs tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736736 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/736736/marikina-opens-3-quarantine-facilities-for-covid-19-patients-with-mild-symptoms-puis/story/ Three emergency quarantine facilities, which will cater for coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) patients with mild symptoms and persons under investigation for the disease, were opened in Marikina City on Monday. Philippines single-day COVID-19 recoveries hit record high; cases now 9,485 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736733 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736733/philippines-single-day-covid-19-recoveries-hit-record-high-cases-now-9-485/story/ The single-day number of patients who have recovered from the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) hit a record high on Monday after the Department of Health (DOH) reported 101 new recoveries, bringing the total to 1,315 The DOH also reported 262 new cases, bringing total infections to 9,485 with over a week to go before the enhanced community quarantine is lifted in areas at high risk for transmission. Mon, 04 May 2020 16:07:57 +0800
